```{r}
# dummy code condition
library(fastDummies)
data <- dummy_cols(data, 
                   select_columns = "Condition")
```

```{r}
# Mediation: Condition -> Fear -> Belief (significant)
model_Fear_Belief <-"
# Direct Effects on Belief
PostBelief ~ a1*Condition_1 + a2*Condition_2 + a3*Condition_3 + b*Fear

# Effect of condition on discomfort
Fear ~ c1*Condition_1 + c2*Condition_2 + c3*Condition_3

# Indirect effects 
ind1:=b*c1
ind2:=b*c2
ind3:=b*c3

# Total effects
total1 := a1 + (b*c1)
total2 := a2 + (b*c2)
total3 := a3 + (b*c3)
"

med_Fear_Belief<-sem(model = model_Fear_Belief, data = data, meanstructure = TRUE, se = "boot", bootstrap = 5000)

summary(med_Fear_Belief,standardized=T,ci = T, fit.measures=T,rsquare=T)
```

```{r}
# Mediation: Condition -> Hope -> support
model_hope_support <-"
# Direct Effects on Support
Support ~ a1*Condition_1 + a2*Condition_2 + a3*Condition_3 + b*Hope

# Effect of condition on hope
Hope ~ c1*Condition_1 + c2*Condition_2 + c3*Condition_3

# Indirect effects (now must include dummy paths for only two levels)
ind1:=b*c1
ind2:=b*c2
ind3:=b*c3

# Total effects
total1 := a1 + (b*c1)
total2 := a2 + (b*c2)
total3 := a3 + (b*c3)
"

model_hope_support<-sem(model = model_hope_support, data = data, meanstructure = TRUE, se = "boot", bootstrap = 5000)

summary(model_hope_support,standardized=T,ci = T,fit.measures=T,rsquare=T)
```

```{r}
# Mediation: Condition -> Personal efficacy -> support
model_Efficacy_Support <-"
# Direct Effects on Belief
Support ~ a1*Condition_1 + a2*Condition_2 + a3*Condition_3 + b*PEfficacy

# Effect of condition on discomfort (note: now we use only two dummies, assuming one as reference)
PEfficacy ~ c1*Condition_1 + c2*Condition_2 + c3*Condition_3

# Indirect effects (now must include dummy paths for only two levels)
ind1:=b*c1
ind2:=b*c2
ind3:=b*c3

# Total effects
total1 := a1 + (b*c1)
total2 := a2 + (b*c2)
total3 := a3 + (b*c3)
"

med_Efficacy_Support<-sem(model = model_Efficacy_Support, data = data, meanstructure = TRUE, se = "boot", bootstrap = 5000)

summary(med_Efficacy_Support,standardized=T,ci = T,fit.measures=T,rsquare=T)
```



```{r}
#Parallel mediation: Condition -> fear/hope/PEfficacy -> support
med_para_emo_eff_support <-"
# Direct Effects on Belief
Support ~ c1*Condition_1 + c2*Condition_2 + c3*Condition_3 + b1*Fear + b2*Hope + b3*PEfficacy

# Effect of condition on discomfort
Fear ~ a1*Condition_1 + a2*Condition_2 + a3*Condition_3
Hope ~ a4*Condition_1 + a5*Condition_2 + a6*Condition_3
PEfficacy ~ a7*Condition_1 + a8*Condition_2 + a9*Condition_3

# Indirect effects
a1b1 := a1*b1
a2b1 := a2*b1
a3b1 := a3*b1
a4b2 := a4*b2
a5b2 := a5*b2
a6b2 := a6*b2
a7b3 := a7*b3
a8b3 := a8*b3
a9b3 := a9*b3

# Total effects
conseq := a1b1 + a4b2 + a7b3+ c1
solu := a2b1 + a5b2 + a8b3 + c2
comb := a3b1 + a6b2 + a9b3 + c3
total := c1 + c2 + c3 + a1b1 + a4b2 + a7b3 + a2b1 + a5b2 + a8b3 + a3b1 + a6b2 + a9b3
"

model_para_emo_eff_support<-sem(model = med_para_emo_eff_support, data = data, meanstructure = TRUE, se = "boot", bootstrap = 5000)

summary(model_para_emo_eff_support,standardized=T,ci = T,fit.measures=T,rsquare=T)
```

### Mediation for Policy Choice

```{r}
# List of Policy_choice variables
policy_vars <- paste0("Policy_choice_", 1:5)
```


```{r}
# Mediation: Condition -> Hope -> choice
model_hope_choice <-"
# Measurement model for Policy_choice
  Policy_choice =~ Policy_choice_1 + Policy_choice_2 + Policy_choice_3 + Policy_choice_4 + Policy_choice_5

# Direct Effects on Support
Policy_choice ~ a1*Condition_1 + a2*Condition_2 + a3*Condition_3 + b*Hope

# Effect of condition on hope
Hope ~ c1*Condition_1 + c2*Condition_2 + c3*Condition_3

# Indirect effects (now must include dummy paths for only two levels)
ind1:=b*c1
ind2:=b*c2
ind3:=b*c3

# Total effects
total1 := a1 + (b*c1)
total2 := a2 + (b*c2)
total3 := a3 + (b*c3)
"

med_hope_choice <- sem(
  model = model_hope_choice,
  data = data,
  meanstructure = TRUE,
  estimator = "DWLS",
  ordered = policy_vars,
  se = "boot",
  bootstrap = 5000
)

summary(med_hope_choice,standardized=T,ci = T,fit.measures=T,rsquare=T)
```
